epic.title: White-Label Digital Patient Experience
epic.summary: Custom-branded mobile applications (iOS/Android) and web portals that extend clinic branding while leveraging Umami's backend infrastructure, enabling telemedicine and patient engagement.
epic.businessOverview: Custom-branded mobile applications (iOS/Android) and web portals that extend clinic branding while leveraging Umami's backend infrastructure, enabling telemedicine and patient engagement.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- React Native framework for cross-platform apps
- WebRTC media server (Jitsi/Twilio)
- Push notification service (FCM/APNS)
- CDN for content delivery (Cloudflare)
- Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS) API layer
- Analytics platform (Firebase/Mixpanel)
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Week 1:**
- Requirements workshop and brand asset collection

**Week 2-4:**
- Mobile app development and testing

**Week 5:**
- App Store submission and review

**Week 6:**
- Launch with marketing support
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Pediatric Clinic, Miami**

- **Challenge:** Low engagement, difficult telehealth scheduling
- **Outcome:** 5,000+ downloads in month 1, 40% increase in telehealth utilization

stories.title: Custom branding (logo, colors, splash screen)
stories.description: Enable custom branding of mobile applications including clinic logo, color scheme, and splash screen to maintain brand consistency and provide a personalized patient experience.

stories.title: App Store and Google Play submission under clinic account
stories.description: Support App Store and Google Play submission process allowing clinics to publish apps under their own developer accounts, maintaining brand ownership and control.

stories.title: Push notification service for appointment reminders
stories.description: Implement push notification service to send appointment reminders, reducing no-shows and improving patient engagement through timely notifications.

stories.title: Biometric authentication (Face ID, Touch ID, fingerprint)
stories.description: Enable biometric authentication using Face ID, Touch ID, and fingerprint recognition to provide secure, convenient access to patient health information.

stories.title: Offline mode for viewing cached records
stories.description: Support offline mode allowing patients to view cached medical records and information when network connectivity is unavailable, improving accessibility.

stories.title: In-app chat with care team
stories.description: Provide secure in-app messaging functionality enabling patients to communicate with their care team, facilitating care coordination and patient support.

stories.title: Appointment booking and management
stories.description: Enable appointment booking and management directly through the mobile app, allowing patients to schedule, reschedule, and cancel appointments conveniently.

stories.title: Prescription refill requests
stories.description: Allow patients to request prescription refills through the mobile app, streamlining the refill process and reducing administrative burden for clinics.

stories.title: Bill payment and insurance card upload
stories.description: Enable bill payment functionality and insurance card upload through the mobile app, providing convenient financial management and insurance verification.

stories.title: WebRTC-based video calls (HIPAA-compliant)
stories.description: Implement WebRTC-based video calling infrastructure with HIPAA compliance to enable secure telemedicine consultations between patients and providers.

stories.title: Waiting room with queue management
stories.description: Provide virtual waiting room functionality with queue management to organize patient flow and ensure smooth telemedicine visit experiences.

stories.title: Screen sharing for document review
stories.description: Enable screen sharing capability during video calls to allow providers and patients to review documents, test results, and other materials together.

stories.title: In-call chat and file sharing
stories.description: Support in-call chat messaging and secure file sharing during telemedicine sessions to facilitate communication and information exchange.

stories.title: Visit recording (with consent)
stories.description: Enable visit recording functionality with patient consent to allow review of telemedicine consultations and support care documentation.

stories.title: Post-visit summary and prescriptions
stories.description: Automatically generate and deliver post-visit summaries and prescriptions after telemedicine consultations, ensuring patients have access to care instructions.

stories.title: Virtual visit billing integration
stories.description: Integrate virtual visit billing with clinic billing systems to ensure accurate coding, claims submission, and reimbursement for telemedicine services.

stories.title: Medication list with reminders
stories.description: Display patient medication list with customizable reminders to improve medication adherence and support medication management.

stories.title: Lab result viewing with explanations
stories.description: Enable patients to view lab results with plain-language explanations to improve health literacy and patient understanding of test results.

stories.title: Health education content library
stories.description: Provide comprehensive health education content library accessible to patients, supporting health literacy and self-management of conditions.

stories.title: Symptom checker (AI-powered triage)
stories.description: Implement AI-powered symptom checker to help patients assess symptoms and determine appropriate care level, supporting triage and care navigation.

stories.title: Care plan tracking (diabetes, hypertension)
stories.description: Enable care plan tracking for chronic conditions like diabetes and hypertension, allowing patients to monitor progress and adhere to treatment plans.

stories.title: Wearable device integration (Apple Health, Google Fit)
stories.description: Integrate with wearable devices through Apple Health and Google Fit to automatically sync health data and support comprehensive health monitoring.

stories.title: Immunization record and reminders
stories.description: Maintain immunization records and send reminders for upcoming vaccinations to ensure patients stay up-to-date with recommended immunizations.

stories.title: Custom domain hosting (portal.yourclinic.com)
stories.description: Support custom domain hosting allowing clinics to use their own domain (e.g., portal.yourclinic.com) for the patient portal, maintaining brand consistency.

stories.title: SSL certificate management
stories.description: Automatically manage SSL certificates for custom domains to ensure secure, encrypted connections and maintain compliance with security standards.

stories.title: Responsive design (mobile, tablet, desktop)
stories.description: Implement responsive design ensuring optimal user experience across mobile devices, tablets, and desktop computers for maximum accessibility.

stories.title: White-label branding across all pages
stories.description: Apply white-label branding consistently across all portal pages, including clinic logos, colors, and styling to maintain brand identity.

stories.title: SEO optimization for clinic visibility
stories.description: Implement SEO optimization features to improve clinic visibility in search engine results and support patient acquisition through organic search.

stories.title: Analytics dashboard for patient engagement metrics
stories.description: Provide analytics dashboard displaying patient engagement metrics to help clinics understand portal usage and identify opportunities for improvement.

stories.title: Targeted health campaigns (flu shot reminders)
stories.description: Enable targeted health campaigns such as flu shot reminders to proactively engage patients and promote preventive care services.

stories.title: Email newsletter management
stories.description: Support email newsletter creation and distribution to keep patients informed about clinic news, health tips, and service updates.

stories.title: SMS broadcast for clinic updates
stories.description: Enable SMS broadcast functionality to send clinic updates, announcements, and important information to patients via text messaging.

stories.title: Patient satisfaction surveys (NPS)
stories.description: Implement patient satisfaction surveys including Net Promoter Score (NPS) to measure patient experience and identify areas for improvement.

stories.title: Referral program management
stories.description: Support referral program management to track patient referrals, reward referrers, and measure program effectiveness for patient acquisition.

stories.title: Automated birthday and anniversary greetings
stories.description: Send automated personalized birthday and anniversary greetings to patients to enhance patient relationships and demonstrate care and attention.

stories.title: App load time < 2 seconds on 4G network
stories.description: Ensure mobile app load time is less than 2 seconds on 4G network to provide fast, responsive user experience and reduce abandonment.

stories.title: Video call quality: 720p at 30fps minimum
stories.description: Maintain video call quality at minimum 720p resolution and 30 frames per second to ensure clear, smooth telemedicine consultations.

stories.title: Support 100 concurrent video sessions
stories.description: Support 100 concurrent video sessions simultaneously without degradation to accommodate multiple telemedicine consultations across the clinic.

stories.title: Push notification delivery < 5 seconds
stories.description: Ensure push notification delivery within 5 seconds to provide timely alerts and reminders for appointments and important updates.

stories.title: App Store rating target: 4.5+ stars
stories.description: Design and optimize app to achieve and maintain App Store rating of 4.5+ stars through excellent user experience and functionality.

stories.title: Maximum 3 taps to access key features
stories.description: Ensure key features are accessible within maximum 3 taps from the home screen to provide intuitive navigation and reduce user friction.

stories.title: Support iOS 15+ and Android 10+
stories.description: Support iOS 15 and later, and Android 10 and later to ensure compatibility with current and recent mobile operating systems.

stories.title: Accessibility: VoiceOver/TalkBack support
stories.description: Implement full accessibility support including VoiceOver (iOS) and TalkBack (Android) to ensure app is usable by patients with visual impairments.

stories.title: HIPAA-compliant video infrastructure (Twilio/Agora)
stories.description: Deploy HIPAA-compliant video infrastructure using providers like Twilio or Agora to ensure secure, compliant telemedicine communications.

stories.title: Certificate pinning for API security
stories.description: Implement certificate pinning for API communications to prevent man-in-the-middle attacks and ensure secure data transmission.

stories.title: Encrypted local storage for cached data
stories.description: Use encrypted local storage for all cached patient data to protect sensitive information stored on mobile devices.

stories.title: Automatic logout on app backgrounding (configurable)
stories.description: Implement automatic logout when app is backgrounded (configurable) to prevent unauthorized access to patient data on unattended devices.

stories.title: Support 10,000+ active users per clinic
stories.description: Support 10,000+ active users per clinic without performance degradation to accommodate large patient populations and high usage.

stories.title: CDN distribution for global app downloads
stories.description: Use CDN distribution for global app downloads to ensure fast, reliable app delivery to patients worldwide regardless of geographic location.

stories.title: Auto-scaling for video infrastructure
stories.description: Implement auto-scaling for video infrastructure to automatically adjust capacity based on demand, ensuring consistent performance during peak usage.
